reviewText: My grandson loves cowboys and rodeos so this was perfect for him!
This is awesome. Have had this video for many years.
Grankids really liked this. I have both parts.

Fun to watch and interesting just like Part One, which we also recommend. I can't really put my finger on why 4 stars instead of 5, except that perhaps some aspects were a bit corny. That said, it is entertaining and educational, and we are glad we purchased.
Our grandson could watch this all day!  He's 5 yrs. old.
Grandkids love this movie. well done with great music.. Amazing how the kids ask to watch this movie.. wish I ould have found it sooner
Talks about what really happens on the ranch. It shows the fun part too with the rodeo. I like the songs in there as well b/c kids always love songs about what they are interested in.

I teach a cowboy unit each year to my 2nd grade students but needed something visual that they would enjoy.  I bought this DVD and the 1st one.  The kids loved them and the information was fun!  These are great and I will use them each year.  The music is catchy, too.  This DVD is perfect for kids!
